Articles.Content: I realize this obviously would not be high up on the priority list, but I think that animations for the circular and ram intake fan blades would look pretty sweet! Rotating animations would definitely add a nice touch to the game, especially for those who often use air breathing aircraft.
While im all for it, i hate to say, this is extremely low priority right now. Itd actually require redoing the intakes with moving parts, which isnt exactly a super fast job.
Perhaps more generally, support for these sorts of (continuous/while-active) animations, and multiple animations per part.
